name: Trashtronaut
description: A lone astronaut must fuel his ship to escape Earth, but robots have taken over and used all the fossil fuels. In lieu of oil, our astronaut must collect trash to fuel his ship, while avoiding obstacles and drones. Trashtronaut is a side-scrolling, resource-collection game in which you must collect soda cans, banana peels, and old tires to take back to your ship before the level's time runs out. Collect power-ups to improve your time/abilities. Some trash is worth more fuel than others!
